alert.note: Alert for Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tazewell County through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Tiptop, or 8 miles north of Tazewell, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bluefield... Tiptop... Boissevain... and Gratton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Virginia...and southeastern West Virginia.
